CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( Account.Other_Commission__c ))), TEXT(Account.Other_Commission__c), IF(
AND(NOT(Opportunity__r.of_SFLWC_Connector__c > 0),NOT( Opportunity__r.of_SFMC_Connector__c >0),NOT( Opportunity__r.of_SFCC_Connector__c >0),NOT( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName,"Closed Lost" )),OR( SFMC_Is_from_Salesforce_Lead__c, SFMC_Is_influenced_by_Salesforce__c)
),
"20% of ARR",
'' ) )
CustomField.label: SF OEM Partner Commission
